senses.sense_definition: Relating to, involving, or producing hydrolysis, a chemical process of decomposition involving the splitting of a bond and the addition of the hydrogen cation and the hydroxide anion of water.

examples.text: The stomach produces <w>hydrolytic</w> enzymes that are essential for digesting proteins efficiently.
Engineers tested the material to ensure it had sufficient resistance to <w>hydrolytic</w> degradation in humid environments.
